p: FMR was 6.5-fold and 5.5-fold higher than SMR for males and females, respectively (mean ± 1 SD; FMR males (N = 95 males): 1.10 ± 0.50 ml CO 2h −1; FMR females (N = 111): 1.11 ± 0.47 ml CO 2h −1 – SMR males (N = 151): 0.17 ± 0.08 ml CO 2h −1; SMR females (N = 156): 0.20 ± 0.09 ml CO 2h −1). In both sexes, the models for the difference between FMR and SMR gave qualitatively similar results than the models of FMR (See Supplementary information).
